SYSTEM: Ruiziniesta_030414.pdf: Página 15
What have I done so far? 
• Provide support on the final selection of the scientific 
discourse ontologies to be used for annotation 
“A review of ontologies for describing scholarly and 
scientific documents”, submitted to SePublica 2014 
• A first version of the ontology for describing the 
scientific discourse 
• http://purl.org/drinventor/sci-doc
